functions.description: Show database statistics.

functions.description: Main CLI entry point.

functions.description: Run a single compliance case.

functions.description: Run multiple cases and pick a deterministic governing case.

functions.description: Serialize report to a JSON/Excel-friendly dict.

files.name: detailing.py
files.description: Detailing Module — IS 456:2000 / SP 34:1987 Reinforcement Detailing

classes.name: StirrupArrangement
classes.description: Represents a stirrup arrangement for a zone.

classes.name: BeamDetailingResult
classes.description: Complete detailing result for a beam section.

classes.name: HookDimensions
classes.description: Dimensions for a standard hook per IS 456 Cl 26.2.2.

classes.name: AnchorageCheckResult
classes.description: Result of anchorage check at simple support.

functions.name: get_bond_stress
functions.description: Get design bond stress τbd.

functions.name: calculate_development_length
functions.description: Calculate development length (Ld) per IS 456 Cl 26.2.1.

functions.name: calculate_lap_length
functions.description: Calculate lap splice length per IS 456 Cl 26.2.5.

functions.name: get_min_bend_radius
functions.description: Get minimum internal bend radius per IS 456 Cl 26.2.2.1.

functions.name: calculate_standard_hook
functions.description: Calculate standard hook dimensions per IS 456 Cl 26.2.2.

functions.name: calculate_anchorage_length
functions.description: Calculate anchorage arrangement combining straight + hook.

functions.name: calculate_stirrup_anchorage
functions.description: Calculate stirrup anchorage hook requirements per IS 456.

functions.name: check_anchorage_at_simple_support
functions.description: Check anchorage of bottom bars at simple supports per IS 456 Cl 26.2.3.3.

functions.name: calculate_bar_spacing
functions.description: Calculate center-to-center spacing of bars.

functions.name: check_min_spacing
functions.description: Check if bar spacing meets IS 456 Cl 26.3.2 requirements.

functions.name: check_side_face_reinforcement
functions.description: Check if side-face reinforcement is required per IS 456 Cl 26.5.1.3.

functions.name: select_bar_arrangement
functions.description: Select a practical bar arrangement to provide required steel area.

functions.name: get_stirrup_legs
functions.description: Determine number of stirrup legs based on beam width.

functions.name: format_bar_callout
functions.description: Format bar callout in standard notation.

functions.name: format_stirrup_callout
functions.description: Format stirrup callout.

functions.name: create_beam_detailing
functions.description: Create complete beam detailing from design output.

functions.name: check_geometry
functions.description: Clause 6.1: Geometry requirements

functions.name: get_min_tension_steel_percentage
functions.description: Clause 6.2.1 (b): Min tension steel ratio

functions.name: get_max_tension_steel_percentage
functions.description: Clause 6.2.2: Max tension steel ratio = 2.5%

functions.name: calculate_confinement_spacing
functions.description: Clause 6.3.5: Hoop spacing in confinement zone (2d from face)

functions.name: check_beam_ductility
functions.description: Perform comprehensive ductility checks for a beam section.

functions.name: calculate_mu_lim
functions.description: Calculate limiting moment of resistance for a rectangular section.

functions.name: calculate_effective_flange_width
functions.description: Calculate effective flange width (IS 456 Cl 23.1.2).

functions.name: calculate_ast_required
functions.description: Calculate required tension steel for a singly reinforced section.

functions.name: design_singly_reinforced
functions.description: Design a singly reinforced rectangular beam section.

functions.name: design_doubly_reinforced
functions.description: Design a beam that can be singly or doubly reinforced.

functions.name: calculate_mu_lim_flanged
functions.description: Calculate limiting moment of resistance for a flanged (T/L) section.

functions.name: design_flanged_beam
functions.description: Design a Flanged Beam (T-Beam).

functions.name: compute_udl_bmd_sfd
functions.description: Compute BMD and SFD for UDL on simply supported beam.

functions.name: compute_point_load_bmd_sfd
functions.description: Compute BMD and SFD for point load on simply supported beam.

functions.name: compute_cantilever_udl_bmd_sfd
functions.description: Compute BMD and SFD for UDL on cantilever beam (fixed at x=0).

functions.name: compute_cantilever_point_load_bmd_sfd
functions.description: Compute BMD and SFD for point load on cantilever beam.

functions.name: compute_bmd_sfd
functions.description: Compute BMD and SFD for a beam with specified loads.

functions.name: check_deflection_span_depth
functions.description: Level A deflection check using span/depth ratio.

functions.name: check_crack_width
functions.description: Level A crack width check.

functions.name: calculate_cracking_moment
functions.description: Calculate cracking moment Mcr per IS 456 Annex C.

functions.name: calculate_gross_moment_of_inertia
functions.description: Calculate gross moment of inertia Igross for rectangular section.

functions.name: calculate_cracked_moment_of_inertia
functions.description: Calculate cracked moment of inertia Icr for rectangular section.

functions.name: calculate_effective_moment_of_inertia
functions.description: Calculate effective moment of inertia Ieff per IS 456 Annex C.

functions.name: get_long_term_deflection_factor
functions.description: Calculate long-term deflection multiplier per IS 456 Cl 23.2.1.

functions.name: calculate_short_term_deflection
functions.description: Calculate short-term (immediate) deflection using elastic analysis.

functions.name: check_deflection_level_b
functions.description: Level B deflection check with full curvature-based calculation.

functions.name: get_creep_coefficient
functions.description: Calculate creep coefficient (θ) per IS 456 Annex C.

functions.name: calculate_shrinkage_curvature
functions.description: Calculate shrinkage curvature per IS 456 Annex C.

functions.name: calculate_creep_deflection
functions.description: Calculate creep deflection component.

functions.name: calculate_shrinkage_deflection
functions.description: Calculate shrinkage deflection from shrinkage curvature.

functions.name: check_deflection_level_c
functions.description: Level C deflection check with separate creep and shrinkage.

functions.name: round_to_practical_spacing
functions.description: Round calculated stirrup spacing to practical construction values.

functions.name: select_stirrup_diameter
functions.description: Select appropriate stirrup diameter based on shear demand.

functions.name: calculate_tv
functions.description: Calculate nominal shear stress (tv).

functions.name: design_shear
functions.description: Main Shear Design Function

files.name: slenderness.py
files.description: Slenderness Check Module — IS 456:2000 Beam Lateral Stability

classes.name: BeamType
classes.description: Classification of beam for slenderness limits.

classes.name: SlendernessResult
classes.description: Result of beam slenderness (lateral stability) check.

functions.name: get_slenderness_limit
functions.description: Get the slenderness limit for a given beam type.

functions.name: calculate_slenderness_ratio
functions.description: Calculate the slenderness ratio for a beam.

functions.name: check_beam_slenderness
functions.description: Check beam slenderness for lateral stability per IS 456 Cl 23.3.

functions.name: get_tc_value
functions.description: Get Design Shear Strength (Tc) from Table 19.

functions.name: get_tc_max_value
functions.description: Get Maximum Shear Stress (Tc_max) from Table 20.

classes.name: TorsionResult
classes.description: Result of torsion design per IS 456 Clause 41.

functions.name: calculate_equivalent_shear
functions.description: Calculate equivalent shear force per IS 456 Cl 41.3.1.

functions.name: calculate_equivalent_moment
functions.description: Calculate equivalent bending moment per IS 456 Cl 41.4.2.

functions.name: calculate_torsion_shear_stress
functions.description: Calculate equivalent shear stress for torsion design.

functions.name: calculate_torsion_stirrup_area
functions.description: Calculate stirrup area for combined torsion and shear.

functions.name: calculate_longitudinal_torsion_steel
functions.description: Calculate longitudinal reinforcement for torsion.

functions.name: design_torsion
functions.description: Design beam for combined torsion, shear, and bending.

functions.description: Decorator to mark a function with IS 456 clause references.

functions.description: Get IS 456 clause references for a function.

functions.description: Get detailed information about a specific IS 456 clause.

functions.description: List all clauses in a specific category.

functions.name: get_all_registered_functions
functions.description: Get all functions registered with clause decorators.

functions.description: Search clauses by keyword in title, text, or keywords.

functions.name: generate_traceability_report
functions.description: Generate a traceability report for all registered functions.

functions.description: Get metadata about the clause database.
